text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——What lies within this blood is Pride. What dwells within is……

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……"The Strongest"

While gazing up at the morning sky, I stretched. 
It was just after 5AM.

There weren't many girls practicing this early. 
On the course were just 2 people——……

——That figure, I recognized it. I know who she is. 
At Tracen Academy, that Uma Musume was all too famous.

text_block_list.name: Previous Generation Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for tagging along with my training. 
I know you must already be busy……——

text_block_list.name: Previous Generation Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Duramente.

Ever since she transferred in, she had stood out. 
……There always seemed to be some kind of commotion around her.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl Looking On From a Classroom
text_block_list.text:
Duramente-san is from that family, right? Not just racing, 
but even the rest of the sports world……they're legendary.

text_block_list.name: Trainer With Knit Cap
text_block_list.text:
Her grandmother, and even her great grandfather. 
Even I can tell she's an athlete. That family is 
sure to change history in any sport they're involved in.

text_block_list.name: Trainer Wearing Red Lipstick
text_block_list.text:
Even though she's in a different sport than her 
grandfather, her leg strength should be quite something. 
Definitely……she will influence the racing world.

text_block_list.name: Stylish Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Her posture is impeccable, just like her mother and grandmother. 
Both of them had spectacular runs. Aaaah——

text_block_list.name: Everyone Watching Duramente
text_block_list.text: Right, that girl is——……the "Culmination of that Blood".

The result of a bloodline that sought "excellence" 
as athletes, coalescing in this generation.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……The distance is 3 furlongs, 600m of parallel running. 
Is that correct?

text_block_list.name: Previous Generation Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Yes. At full strength, please. 
My preparations are complete. ……My resolve too.

I ran quickly down the stairs. Since I had a chance 
to watch it, I wanted to see it from as close as I 
could. She would be running right before my eyes——!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text:
Haa……Haa……Haa! 
Haa……Haa……Hmmph!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaaaaaah!!

Without a doubt, 10 out of 10 people would be 
fascinated by that run. Because that was completely——

text_block_list.name: Previous Generation Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Haa……phew……Hahaa…… 
You're so fast……I completely lost.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
With a longer distance, the result wouldn't be so clear. 
Once you reached your top speed, you never slowed down.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
That lung capacity and muscle strength are formidable. 
……I'd like to learn how to do that.

text_block_list.name: Previous Generation Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
……! Ahahahaa, it's so unfair to put it like that. 
Thank you though, for making time for me.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Likewise. If the chance arrives, let's do this again.

Just like that, Dura squatted down. 
And then she started rubbing her ankles——

There was another reason I started running toward her. 
If I missed this chance, I might not get to talk to her again.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……You are?

She looked at me with suspicion so I hastily explained myself. 
……Of course, starting with my reason for approaching.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……? It needs some taping and flexing, but my legs don't hurt. 
Further, I wouldn't do something that reckless at this point in time.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: This is just preventative.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
I have stiff ankles. It's a double-edged sword, strong but can 
easily lead to injury. Our trainer at home warned me about it.

I'd heard that before. That there were advantages 
and disadvantages to having that condition.

For speed, the angle of your ankles when contacting the ground 
is important. And the less flex that occurs in your ankle, 
the more force that gets converted to forward motion.

In other words, the stronger your ankles, the faster 
you can go. This also means your feet are in contact 
less with the ground, which positively impacts speed.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Is there something else?

I could feel my cheeks heating up. She seemed completely unfazed by 
me. But, if this kept up, I might never get to talk to her again——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …………Well then.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: I apologize, but right now I'm rejecting all scouting offers.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……There will be a Selection Race soon. A place where Uma Musume 
aiming to start their careers can show their abilities to trainers.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Starting with the Selection Race, I will prove myself.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……"The strongest".

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Just like my father, and grandfather. They sought to 
be the strongest, as if to change history. I will be 
the one to change the history of the racing world.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
I will rewrite everything. Records, impressions, 
and emotions. To show that I am "The Strongest".

She would "overwrite" it all. Without even knowing how that would 
take shape, I could already see her defeating a top Uma Musume.

She would definitely reach the top. She was so brilliant 
that I already knew she would be the strongest——

……Right, I was convinced already. 
That sight would be even more unbelievable.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
In this Selection Race, a new star has arrived, defeating 
another much-anticipated Uma Musume. First place is——……
——Then I saw her defeated.
